Saying<WH559> to those who are bound,<WH631> 'Go<WH3318> forth,<WH3318>' To those who<WH834> are in darkness,<WH2822> 'Show<WH1540> yourselves.' Along<WH5921> the roads<WH1870> they will feed,<WH7462> And their pasture<WH4830> will be on all<WH3605> bare<WH8205> heights.<WH8205>

As I live,<WH2416>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "You shall surely<WH3588> put<WH3847> on all<WH3605> of them as jewels,<WH5716> and bind<WH7194> them on as a bride.<WH3618>

"For your waste<WH2723> and desolate<WH8074> places, and your destroyed<WH2035> land<WH776> â€“ Surely<WH3588> now<WH6258> you will be too<WH4480> cramped<WH9503> for the inhabitants,<WH3427> And those who swallowed<WH1104> you will be far<WH7368> away.

And who<WH4310> has reared<WH1431> these<WH428>? Behold,<WH2005> I was left<WH7604> alone;<WH905> From where<WH375> did these<WH428> come?'"

"Can the prey<WH4455> be taken<WH3947> from the mighty<WH1368> man,<WH1368> Or<WH518> the captives<WH7628> of a tyrant be rescued<WH4422>?"
